name: Pamago - Ludum Dare 42
description:
Pamago is a game about how a small bird wizard almost destroy the world.

Black magic is coming to the room and you must to save as many objects as you can dropping in the Magic carpet.

CONTROLS

AWSD - Move
SPACE BAR (hold button) - Catch objects
ESC - Pause
or

Play with controller

MULTIPLAYER MODE

Try to save more objects than the other player!
You can attack to each order for stun.

PLAYER 1

AWSD - Move
SPACE BAR (hold button) - Catch objects
F - Attack

PLAYER 2

DIRECTIONAL KEYS - Move
O (hold button) - Catch objects
L - Attack

ESC - Pause

We hope you enjoy the game as much as we did doing it 

CREDITS

Juan Agustí [@Naked_Kiwi](https://twitter.com/naked_kiwi) as programmer

Andrea Latorre [@RoronoaCherry](https://twitter.com/roronoacherry) as artist

Music (Creative Commons 0) by Komiku
